content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(String(md), '\n'), '\n')
    
    extracted_code = ""
    code_blocks = []
    
    for line in lines
        if starts_with(line, "# Julia")
            push!(code_blocks, strip(line, '# Julia \n')))
        end
        if !isempty(code_blocks) && ends_with(line, "\n"))
            extracted_code *= join(code_blocks, '\n')) + "\n"
            code_blocks = []
        end
    end
    
    return extracted_code
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes a Markdown document (`md`) as input and extracts all the Julia code blocks. It removes the code fences and joins the code blocks together with a newline.

The returned String `extracted_code` contains all the extracted Julia code.
